metadata.title: CVE-2022-3111 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6.free_charger_irq() in drivers/power/supply/wm8350_power.c lacks free ofWM8350_IRQ_CHG_FAST_RDY, which is registered in wm8350_init_charger().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
